title: Bible Games 2015
desc: What is "The Bible Games"? Well this is a event dedicated to the pursuit of knowledge for each and every contestant. Our goal is to ensure that not only you memorize verses and study these books to be good at the game, but to instill this into your heart. So what do I get out of this besides learning about the bible? This second question is easy, the grand prize is two hundred dollars, yes I wrote that correctly. Not just that, but lunch will also be provided, and we never skimp on lunch. Criteria for the Event: 1. Individual- So it will be up to you to learn, study and memorize. 2. Jeopardy style- Yes, you will have a clicker, speed and knowledge wins. 3. We will feed you- Snacks and a nice lunch will be provided. 4.You will meet new people- Or maybe just people you know but it will be a fun time. 5. Study up- ?will guide you, and all question will be based on the study guides. 6. Each age group will have a winner with a 50$ prize. 7. You can pay at the door but send us a email at apostolicbiblegames@gmail.comand save your space before December 10,2015, because spaces are limited. I want to thank you, first and foremost to anyone that decides to join us, the study guide link is provided.? Study Guide at the following link:
